data.title: Godzilla (1998) DVD
data.meta_description: Matthew Broderick and Jean Reno save the day when a giant radiation-mutated lizard, AKA, Godzilla, wrecks havoc on the streets of Manhattan. Directed by Roland Emmerirch (Independence Day, Stargate). Special edition includes: audio commentary by the special effects supervisors, "Godzilla Takes New York" before and afte
data.text:
Shipping

Please allow 2-4 business days for your order to process and ship. Orders within the United States typically arrive 5-8 business days after the order has shipped.

We process and ship orders Monday through Friday.

Pre-Orders will ship on or near the release date stated on the product page.

Orders shipped within the United States cost a flat $8 USD. All orders of $150 USD or more currently ship free (gift cards not included)!

Returns

We gladly accept returns, within 60 days of delivery in the same condition that you received them, with the exception of final sale items.
